message: Hi Bob, I suggest a fair division where I get $550000 and you get $450000. Note that inflation affects me 5% per round, so if we delay, the total value decreases for me. This offer gives you a substantial portion while acknowledging my time pressure. I hope you find this reasonable.

Hi Alice, I understand your position on inflation. I'm proposing a slightly adjusted split: $480000 for me and $520000 for you. This recognizes your time pressure while still being a favorable outcome for both of us.
